author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2278 - Same Lucene index to support both property restrictions and fulltext constraints (WIP)
* Restrict LuceneIndex to work with V1 format and LucenePropertyIndex to work
* Testcase currently specify compatVersion to ensure that LuceneIndex gets used.
This is required because testcase create a fresh index and by default fresh index
are always created to support latest version. In actual case (upgrade) LuceneIndex
would anyway be used as for existing index compatible format is used
As we enable support for fulltext in LucenePropertyIndex this compat mode would be

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2272 - Compatibility support for pre index rule configuration
Add a 'compatVersion' property to force usage of specific index format version. This is done to ensure that current test work untill OAK-2278 is done
